name: Ambient Icons
description: The color of the icons syncs with the color of the level you are playing!

change-wave-trail.name: Change wave trail color
change-wave-trail.description:
Makes wave trail color go <cp>ambient</c>.
<co>Having ambient glow enabled makes this option useless</c>

change-glow-color.name: Change glow color
change-glow-color.description:
Makes glow color go <cp>ambient</c>.
<co>Doesn't work with Blending Glow mod</c>

render-x-pos.name: Set X
render-x-pos.description: Set where in the X axis pick the colors.

render-y-pos.name: Set Y
render-y-pos.description: Set where in the Y axis pick the colors.

update-time.name: Update time (ms)
update-time.description: <co>Increase the value if there are too many flashing colors or having fps drops when using Globed</c>

player-flash.name: Show Player Flash
player-flash.description:
Show player flashes in dash orbs, spider orbs, teleports and spider dashes.
<co>It may cause update color bugs when is enabled without 0ms update time</c>
